cern.colt.matrix
Interface Former

public interface Former

Formats a double or complex (double[]) into a string (like sprintf in C).

Version:
1.0, 21/07/00
Author:
wolfgang.hoschek@cern.ch, Piotr Wendykier (piotr.wendykier@gmail.com)
See Also:
Comparator, cern.colt, Sorting
